articles.title: Google admits its Google TV software is too slow - The Verge
articles.description: Google has said that it’s been working on performance improvements for its TV platform, working on making smart TVs and its Chromecast faster and easier to manage.
articles.content:
A variety of changes are coming to both the Chromecast with Google TV and third-party devices.
